input.sentences: getting to see this band play was a real treat for us .
having a refreshing beer after the show really hit the spot .
these were hanging all over the telephone lines .
this cowboy playing guitar was especially fun to listen to .
this deli makes a great sandwich !
output.sentences: Saturday morning block party started as the local band began to play.
Representative companies set up to offer some refreshing beers.
Local artists sang the day away.
Food filled the air for all to enjoy.
